name: Lurker of the Night: Shamzalla
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare #33.

Greetings your spookiness. Where are we, you ask? You are in the room of a little girl, and you have to scare her! Why? Well, because YOU ARE THE MONSTER!

But beware, the girl has a flashlight! Don't let her find you! It will reveal your true identity! Try to find some good places to hide before you scare her.

Your skills are at the bottom of the screen. Click them, or use their respective number key. But most of all ... be VERY spooky!

F11 to toggle fullscreen Escape to go to menu or to exit game

Linux users please install LÖVE (0.9.2)

Features: - Fully voiced - Adaptive music - Fully animated character - Pathfinding - Lighting engine - 10+ unique interactive icons with voiced description - All assest are custom made during the jam except for fonts

ATTENTION: JAM VERSION ONLY SUPPORTS A RESOLUTION OF 1920*1080

Post jam version is the .love version.
